:::::{#about}

Man completed her PhD in the Quantitative Methods program at UW-Madison. Her research interests include meta-analysis, single-case experimental designs, and hierarchical linear modeling. She is currently an assistant professor in the Educational Psychology Department (Quantitative Methods Program) at UT Austin.
